DOC.brief_title: IL 6 Measurement Using a New Densitometric Bedside (POC) Test
DOC.detailed_description: In an equivalence analysis, we determined whether IL-6 can be assessed using a new densitometric point-of-care (POC) assay (turn-around -time: 20 minutes) that allows IL-6 measurements at the bedside. We then compared the respective test results to those obtained with conventional ELISA analysis
